net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.querybuilder

Class Condition

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.querybuilder.Condition
  • Deprecated. 
    (experimental and incomplete)

    public class Condition
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a conditional statement in a SQLite WHERE clause.
    Since:
    zerobandwidth-net/android 0.1.1 (#20)
